EMGPlacementScheme: The fine-wires were inserted as pairs using a cannulae to a target depth of 2 cm. After the insertion, the bipolar EMG was visually inspected and if needed the electrode positions were adjusted through light needle moovements. Afterwards, the cannula was removed leaving only the fine wires within the muscle.
TaskDescription: Patients were instructed to relax for 5 minutes before each recording and during the recording itself. Each recording lasted 1 minute and every 6 seconds the examiner slightly moved the needle to trigger myotonic activity.
